value.name: Displacement Shield
value.info_text:
This intricate spell erects a space distortion around the caster that is linked to another distortion, placed around a target.

Any time the caster should take damage, there is a 46%, 53%, 59%, 66%, 72% chance that it will instead be warped by the shield and hit the designated target.

Once the maximum damage (327, 426, 502, 567, 625) is absorbed, the time runs out (13, 17, 21, 25, 25 turns), or the target dies, the shield will crumble.

The max damage the shield can absorb will increase with your Spellpower.

value2.name: Displacement Shield
value2.info_text:
This intricate spell erects a space distortion around the caster that is linked to another distortion, placed around a target.

Any time the caster should take damage, there is a 46%, 53%, 59%, 66%, 72% chance that it will instead be warped by the shield and hit the designated target.

Once the maximum damage (327, 426, 502, 567, 625) is absorbed, the time runs out (13, 17, 21, 25, 25 turns), or the target dies, the shield will crumble.

The max damage the shield can absorb will increase with your Spellpower.

value.info_text:
You recover faster from poisons, diseases and wounds, reducing the duration of all such effects by 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56%.

Additionally, when your life falls below 50%, you heal for a base 19, 22, 24, 26, 27 health plus 2.6%, 3.1%, 3.5%, 3.8%, 4.0% of your maximum life (currently 22, 25, 27, 30, 31 total) each turn for 8 turns .

The base healing scales with your Constitution.
value.name: Vitality

value2.info_text:
You recover faster from poisons, diseases and wounds, reducing the duration of all such effects by 20%, 34%, 43%, 50%, 56%.

Additionally, when your life goes below 50%, you heal for 6%, 16%, 24%, 30%, 36% of your max HP (6, 16, 24, 30, 36) over 8 turns up to a max of 100 per turn.

The healing will scale with your Constitution.
value2.name: Vitality

value.name: Death Dance
value.info_text:
Spin around, extending your weapon and damaging all targets around you for 175%, 190%, 201%, 211%, 219% weapon damage.

At level 3 all damage done will also make the targets bleed for an additional 37%, 64%, 85%, 102%, 117% damage over 5 turns

value2.name: Death Dance
value2.info_text:
Spin around, extending your weapon and damaging all targets around you for 175%, 190%, 201%, 211%, 219% weapon damage.

At level 3 all damage done will also make the targets bleed for an additional 61%, 99%, 128%, 153%, 175% damage over 5 turns

value.info_text:
Using your connection to Nature, you can see your surrounding area in a radius of 7, 9, 11, 12, 13.

Also, while meditating, you are able to detect the presence of creatures around you in a radius of 3, 4, 5, 5, 6.
value.name: Earth's Eyes

value2.info_text:
Using your connection to Nature, you can see your surrounding area in a radius of 7, 9, 11, 12, 13.

Also, while meditating, you are able to detect the presence of creatures around your in a radius of 3, 4, 5, 5, 6.
value2.name: Earth's Eyes

value.name: Mucus
value.info_text:
For 4, 5, 5, 6, 7 turns, you lay down mucus where you walk or stand.

The mucus is placed automatically every turn and lasts 4, 5, 5, 6, 7 turns.

At talent level 4 or greater, the mucus will expand to a radius 1 area from where it is placed.

Your mucus will poison all foes crossing it, dealing 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 nature damage every turn for 5 turns (stacking).

In addition, each turn, you will restore 4.7, 6.4, 7.7, 8.9, 9.8 Equilibrium while in your own mucus, and other friendly creatures in your mucus will restore 1 Equilibrium both for you and for themselves.

The Poison damage and Equilibrium regeneration increase with your Mindpower, and laying down more mucus in the same spot will intensify its effects and refresh its duration.

value2.name: Mucus
value2.info_text:
For 4, 5, 5, 6, 7 turns, you lay down mucus where you walk or stand.

The mucus is placed automatically every turn and lasts 4, 5, 5, 6, 7 turns.

At talent level 4 or greater, the mucus will expand to a radius 1 area from where it is placed.

Your mucus will poison all foes crossing it, dealing 59, 80, 96, 110, 122 nature damage every turn for 5 turns (stacking).

In addition, each turn, you will restore 4.7, 6.4, 7.7, 8.9, 9.8 Equilibrium while in your own mucus, and other friendly creatures in your mucus will restore 1 Equilibrium both for you and for themselves.

The Poison damage and Equilibrium regeneration increase with your Mindpower, and laying down more mucus in the same spot will intensify its effects and refresh its duration.
